metadata.inclusion:
1. Press and hold the program switch for more than 5 seconds until the LED turns on
2. Release the program switch
3. The LED blinks 3 times when successful, or turns off if failed
metadata.exclusion:
1. Press and hold the program switch for more than 5 seconds until the LED turns on
2. Release the program switch
3. The LED blinks 3 times when successful, or turns off if failed
metadata.reset:
1. Press and hold the program switch for more than 10 seconds until the LED blinks
2. Release the program switch
3. The LED blinks 5 times when successful, or turns off if failed
